description: Imported on Mon Jan 23 2023 20:04:25 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)

customHTML.value:
[ { "children": [ { "text": "

DaVinci Widget App

Deployed with Terraform

This display is a simple example of running a DV Flow in a Widget app. Everything is deployed using Terraform - with the relevent information passed into the application to run the Widget and Flow.

The CompanyID, PolicyID, and APIKey are created using the PingOne and DaVinci TF Providers and passed to the NodeJS app to execute the invokeWidget function on the client.

If you are seeing this message - the deployment has been successful

" } ] } ]
